channel.title: Player Doesn't Lose Anything on log out, or death
channel.description:
Working on a 2006 source, and was testing some pking, and whatnot, but when the player dies, or exits out during pking they do not lose anything, meaning the other person most likely doesn't get anything, If you are killed by an NPC like a lesser deamon for example, you also do not lose anything when you die, anyone know how to fix this? :)
Any help would be greatly appreciated! :D

item.title: Player Doesn't Lose Anything on log out, or death
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

in the client class, search for something like “deathstage”
this is where the dying is handled in regular delta’s.
Then you’ll have to inspect the code and find what might execute dropping

Read full topic
item.source: Player Doesn't Lose Anything on log out, or death

item.title: Player Doesn't Lose Anything on log out, or death
item.dc:creator: @Ian1045 Ian1045
item.description:
@Ian1045 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:7, topic:456958”][quote author=Ian1045 link=topic=559901.msg4089520#msg4089520 date=1346195145]

What’s the base? Dropping items on death is probably just commented out.

I started on a source called “iSkape”. I think it is delta based.
[/quote]
Yeah, that doesn’t have dropping on death,
you’ll have to add it yourself, use another server that has it as example.[/quote]

Do you know what “.java” file it can be found under?
(on the other server, ofc)

Read full topic
item.source: Player Doesn't Lose Anything on log out, or death
